left.text: This data sharing platform supports the management, analysis and sharing of Australian Coronary Artery Disease (CAD) cohorts as part of the Australian Cardiovascular Alliance (ACvA) Precision Medicine flagship.

cards.bodyText: Use the Study Explorer to view summary information about the information collected across the ACDC cohorts and apply for access.
The Data Explorer allows you to explore and filter data by the harmonised variables. Detailed information is only available after gaining access to a particular study.
The platform has a harmonised data dictionary that describes the captured variables across all studies. Please study the dictionary before you start browsing.
